channel.title: Central Asia on Agoraflix
channel.description: Recent content in Central Asia on Agoraflix

item.title: Why is the policy of sanctions not efficient? The evening with Vladimir Soloviev - May 17, 2018
item.description: Guests of the program discuss the current models of the USA and Russia development, trying to find the best one. They want to find out how to cooperate with the countries of Central Asia, and avoid new conflicts in this region. If you want us to produce more subtitles of Vladimir Soloviev's shows and more subtitles from other shows in other countries, please consider supporting us with a donation (via Paypal).
